at.irian.ankor.el

Class FriendlyListELResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.el.ELResolver
      • javax.el.ListELResolver
        • at.irian.ankor.el.FriendlyListELResolver

  • public class FriendlyListELResolver
extends javax.el.ListELResolver
    Like a ListELResolver but will not throw a PropertyNotFoundException when setting out of upper bounds indices. It will instead fill the intermediate fields with null.
    See Also:
    ListELResolver, List
